amendment.description: To allow the Secretary to extend the deadline for collecting terrorism loss risk-spreading premiums if the mandatory recoupment is more than $1,000,000,000.

action.text: Amendment SA 3549 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 3549 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 229.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3549.
Amendment SA 3549 proposed by Senator Coburn.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 3549 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 229.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3549 proposed by Senator Coburn.
